title.narrative: Review and Capacity Assessment of Danish Refugee Council

description.narrative: The overall objective of this review is to assess DRC’s capacity and performance in delivering results under its engagement with the MFA, with a particular view to stimulate learning and support relevant organisation development. The specific objectives are to: • Assess and validate programmatic results documentation by DRC for the period 2015-2018 , based on a sample. • Assess DRC’s overall strategic, organisational, programmatic and financial management capacity to achieve the results put forward in DRC’s engagement with the MFA. The review should issue recommendations, which will provide a critical input to the MFA’s on-going dialogue with DRC. The review will have a thematic focus on: • DRC’s programme platform and multi-sector approach • DRC’s work across the humanitarian/development/peace nexus • DRC’s Emergency Response capacity • DRC’s approach to local partnerships and capacity building • Cohesion between HQ, regional structures and field operations as well as strategic leadership.

title.narrative: Report with key recommendations to the organisation to be used for the annual consultations with HMC.
